description: Name of the official YouTube Kids app name.
A media object with visual content; may or may not also have audio content.
A user's public presence on YouTube. This includes the user's channel page, any videos they upload, and the record of their activities on the site that is viewable by their friends.
A grouping of videos created by a user. Playlists allow users to organize videos in useful ways, such as playing videos in a certain sequence.
